{{album | image = Rings of Power Season 2 Soundtrack.jpg | title=The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
(Season Two: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack) | type=Soundtrack | artist=[[Bear McCreary]] | released=[[23 August]], [[2024]] | genre= | length= | language= | label= }} '''''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season Two: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)''''' is an album composed by [[Bear McCreary]] for the second season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' television series. It was released online on [[23 August]], [[2024]] by Amazon Music. ==Contents== # [[Old Tom Bombadil]] (feat. [[Rufus Wainwright]]) # [[Rhûn (soundtrack)|Rhûn]] (feat. [[The Mystery of the Bulgarian Voices]]) # [[Life in the Canyon]] # [[Golden Leaves]] (feat. [[Benjamin Walker]]) # [[Círdan's Perfection]] # [[Stone Singers]] (feat. [[Sophia Nomvete]]) # [[Sandstorm at the Well]] # [[Eregion (soundtrack)|Eregion]] # [[Emissary at the Forge]] # [[Shelob (soundtrack)|Shelob]] # [[The Pyre]] (feat. [[Raya Yarbrough]]) # [[Estrid (soundtrack)|Estrid]] # [[The Great Eagle]] # [[The River-daughter]] (feat. [[Clydene Jackson]]) # [[Army of Orcs]] # [[The Last Ballad of Damrod]] (feat. [[Jens Kidman]]) # [[Battle for Eregion]] # [[Durin's Bane (soundtrack)|Durin's Bane]] # [[Last Temptation]] # [[The Staff]] # [[Old Tom Bombadil|Old Tom Bombadil Reprise]] (feat. Rory Kinnear and Daniel Weyman) # [[The Sun Yet Shines]] ==See also== * [[Index:Soundtracks by year|Soundtracks by year]] ==External links== * [https://press.amazonmgmstudios.com/us/en/press-release/ithe-lord-of-the-rings-the-rings-of-poweri-season--1 The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season Two: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack) To Be Released Worldwide August 23, 2024] {{title|italics}} [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season Two: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)| ]]
